summary: This document is an email chain from May 28, 2020, between Mark L. Epstein and an FBI agent from the New York field office. The FBI agent requests the current addresses of Mark L. Epstein's ex-wife, children, and himself, citing a need to increase patrol presence due to a concerning LinkedIn message from outside the US. The exchange shows a security concern being investigated.

persons.name: Mark L. Epstein
persons.context: He is communicating with an FBI agent about a security threat, providing information about his and his family's locations in response to a concerning message.

events.title: FBI Inquiry Regarding Security Threat
events.description: An FBI agent from the New York field office emails Mark L. Epstein to request the current addresses of his ex-wife, children, and himself, following up on a concerning LinkedIn message. The agent states the message originated from outside the US and plans to contact local police to increase patrols.

keyFacts: The FBI was investigating a concerning LinkedIn message sent to Mark L. Epstein that was determined to have originated from outside the United States.
Mark L. Epstein disclosed his location and that of his ex-wife and children to the FBI in response to a request for addresses to increase security patrols.
The email chain indicates an active security concern or threat assessment involving Mark L. Epstein and his family in May 2020.
